verses.verse: תְּפִלָּה֮ <WH8605> A Prayer לְמֹשֶׁ֪ה <WH4872> of Moses אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> of God אֲ‍ֽדֹנָ֗י <WH136> Lord מָע֣וֹן <WH4583> thou hast been our dwelling place אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You הָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> have been לָּ֗נוּ בְּדֹ֣ר <WH1755> in all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

בְּטֶ֤רֶם ׀ <WH2962> Before הָ֘רִ֤ים <WH2022> Before the mountains יֻלָּ֗דוּ <WH3205> were brought forth וַתְּח֣וֹלֵֽל <WH2342> or ever thou hadst formed אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְתֵבֵ֑ל <WH8398> and the world וּֽמֵעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> even from everlasting עַד־ <WH5704> to ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> everlasting אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You אֵֽל׃ <WH410> thou [art] God

תָּשֵׁ֣ב <WH7725> Thou turnest אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <WH582> man עַד־ <WH5704> into דַּכָּ֑א <WH1793> to destruction וַ֝תֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and sayest שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Return בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ye children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

כִּ֤י <WH3588> when אֶ֪לֶף <WH505> For a thousand שָׁנִ֡ים <WH8141> years בְּֽעֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight כְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> [are but] as אֶ֭תְמוֹל <WH865> yesterday כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יַעֲבֹ֑ר <WH5674> when it is past וְאַשְׁמוּרָ֥ה <WH821> and [as] a watch בַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> in the night

זְ֭רַמְתָּם <WH2229> Thou carriest them away as with a flood שֵׁנָ֣ה <WH8142> they are [as] a sleep יִהְי֑וּ <WH1961> fall בַּ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning כֶּחָצִ֥יר <WH2682> [they are] like grass יַחֲלֹֽף׃ <WH2498> [which] groweth up

בַּ֭בֹּקֶר <WH1242> In the morning יָצִ֣יץ <WH6692> it flourisheth וְחָלָ֑ף <WH2498> and groweth up לָ֝עֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> in the evening יְמוֹלֵ֥ל <WH4135> it is cut down וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> and withereth
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלִ֥ינוּ <WH3615> For we are consumed בְאַפֶּ֑ךָ <WH639> by thine anger וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ <WH2534> and by thy wrath נִבְהָֽלְנוּ׃ <WH926> are we troubled

[שַׁתָּ כ] (שַׁתָּ֣ה <WH7896> apply ק) עֲוֹנֹתֵ֣ינוּ <WH5771> our iniquities לְנֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5048> before עֲ֝לֻמֵ֗נוּ <WH5956> before thee our secret לִמְא֥וֹר <WH3974> [sins] in the light פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> of thy countenance

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all יָ֭מֵינוּ <WH3117> For all our days פָּנ֣וּ <WH6437> are passed away בְעֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5678> in thy wrath כִּלִּ֖ינוּ <WH3615> we spend שָׁנֵ֣ינוּ <WH8141> our years כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like הֶֽגֶה׃ <WH1899> as a tale

יְמֵֽי־ <WH3117> The days שְׁנוֹתֵ֨ינוּ <WH8141> of our years בָהֶ֥ם שִׁבְעִ֪ים <WH7657> and ten שָׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> years וְאִ֤ם <WH518> if בִּגְבוּרֹ֨ת ׀ <WH1369> and if by reason of strength שְׁמ֘וֹנִ֤ים <WH8084> [they be] fourscore שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years וְ֭רָהְבָּם <WH7296> yet [is] their strength עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> labour וָאָ֑וֶן <WH205> and sorrow כִּי־ <WH3588> for גָ֥ז <WH1468> cut off חִ֝֗ישׁ <WH2440> for it is soon וַנָּעֻֽפָה׃ <WH5774> and we fly away
מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who י֭וֹדֵעַ <WH3045> Who knoweth עֹ֣ז <WH5797> the power אַפֶּ֑ךָ <WH639> of your anger וּ֝כְיִרְאָתְךָ֗ <WH3374> to the fear עֶבְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5678> [so is] thy wrath

לִמְנ֣וֹת <WH4487> [us] to number יָ֭מֵינוּ <WH3117> our days כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So הוֹדַ֑ע <WH3045> So teach וְ֝נָבִ֗א <WH935> that we may apply לְבַ֣ב <WH3824> [our] hearts חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> unto wisdom

שׁוּבָ֣ה <WH7725> Return יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתָ֑י <WH4970> how וְ֝הִנָּחֵ֗ם <WH5162> how long? and let it repent עַל־ <WH5921> for עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> thee concerning thy servants

שַׂבְּעֵ֣נוּ <WH7646> O satisfy בַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> us early חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> with thy mercy וּֽנְרַנְּנָ֥ה <WH7442> that we may rejoice וְ֝נִשְׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8055> and be glad בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יָמֵֽינוּ׃ <WH3117> all our days

שַׂ֭מְּחֵנוּ <WH8055> Make us glad כִּימ֣וֹת <WH3117> according to the days עִנִּיתָ֑נוּ <WH6031> [wherein] thou hast afflicted שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <WH8141> us [and] the years רָאִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> [wherein] we have seen רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil

יֵרָאֶ֣ה <WH7200> appear אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants פָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> Let thy work וַ֝הֲדָרְךָ֗ <WH1926> and thy glory עַל־ <WH5921> unto בְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> unto their children

וִיהִ֤י ׀ <WH1961> Let נֹ֤עַם <WH5278> And let the beauty אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> of the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God עָ֫לֵ֥ינוּ <WH5921> and וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> thou the work יָ֭דֵינוּ <WH3027> of our hands כּוֹנְנָ֥ה <WH3559> be upon us and establish עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> upon us yea the work יָ֝דֵ֗ינוּ <WH3027> of our hands כּוֹנְנֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3559> establish
